Product Development+Engineering+Structur.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the strength and durability of structural components based on testing and performance criteria.
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.FORMULA: Average Score of Structural Integrity Assessments

Product Development+Engineering+Structur.KPIS: Time to Market for Structural Designs
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from the initial concept of structural designs to market launch.
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.FORMULA: Total Time from Structural Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Engineering+Structur.EXPLANATION: Assesses the performance of structural designs in terms of factors like load-bearing capacity and resilience.
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.FORMULA: Average Performance Score of Structural Designs

Product Development+Engineering+Structur.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for structural design adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.FORMULA: (Actual Structural Design Cost / Budgeted Structural Design Cost) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Structur.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of structural designs that require rework before final approval.
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.FORMULA: (Number of Reworked Structural Designs / Total Structural Designs) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Structur.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of structural tests that pass all criteria for success.
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Structural Tests / Total Structural Tests) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Structur.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the overall quality of structural designs based on criteria such as strength, durability, and safety.
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Structural Designs

Product Development+Engineering+Structur.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for structural designs.
Product Development+Engineering+Structur.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Structural Design / Number of Customers)
